Package gameClient

Class Arena

java.lang.Object
gameClient.Arena
public class Arena
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents a multi Agents Arena which move on a graph grabs Pokemons and earn points. This is where all the game is happening: the communication with the server, the agent and pokemons updating, the algorithms performs to manipulate the agents. etc.

  • Constructor Details

    • Arena

      public Arena​(game_service game)
      Construct an arena from a given game_service's information
      Parameters:
      game - the game that holds information of the graph, pokemons etc.

  • Method Details

    • initAgents

      public void initAgents()
      Takes information about the agents from the game service, builds each agent, and initialize their places on the edges that have the most valuable pokemons on the graph. updating the server where we choose to place them.

    • getAgents

      public java.util.List<Agent> getAgents​(java.lang.String json)
      Gets a json string contains information about the agents and creates all the agents from it.
      Parameters:
      json - the json string
      Returns:
      a list of agents

    • updateEdge

      public static void updateEdge​(Pokemon p, directed_weighted_graph g)
      Gets pokemon p holds 3d point as location, finds on what edge this location is and updates the pokemon's edge to the found one.
      Parameters:
      p - the pokemon
      g - the graph

      public static Range2Range w2f​(directed_weighted_graph g, Range2D frame)

    • moveAgents

      public void moveAgents()
      Updates the agents and move each one to its chosen node. the choosing process is in the method nextNode() below.
